title: Voxiversity: Thucydidean test time
author: VD
content_html:
This is an open thread to discuss The History of the Peloponnesian War and the appendices to the Landmark edition; the final test of 25 questions will be posted tomorrow.

In other news, I’ll be doing an hour-long interview on Monday from 4-5 EST with Jerry Hughes. There is an online stream to his show, Straight Talk, if you’d like to listen.
content_text:
This is an open thread to discuss
The History of the Peloponnesian War
and the appendices to the Landmark edition; the final test of 25 questions will be posted tomorrow.
In other news, I’ll be doing an hour-long interview on Monday from 4-5 EST with Jerry Hughes.  There is an online stream to his show, Straight Talk,
if you’d like to listen
.
